text:
@realDonaldTrump Your favorite sister duo, sugar and spice, lace and white, or whatever their names are, were terminated by Fox news for formulating unproven esoteric unfounded conspiracy theories re covid19.  BE careful, the same might happen to you.

And as Mellie is always glad to say BE BEST
